channel.title: BeyondRSC - For PKers By PKers
channel.description:
[b]We are:[/b]
- a fast rate PK server with custom features to spice the game up. - a game driven by the community, what the majority want, they get. - a lot of our players are very competitive, if your one that likes a challenge, check us out! - Active community - Active development, constant updates
[b]Details:[/b]
XP Rate: 40-80x Host: Staminus + SecurePort (DDoS Protection) (Hosted in USA) Type: Funserver, Semi F2P (P2P minus Dragon items)
[b]Some pictures & features[/b]
We have a Party system that allows friends / nearby players to train together & gain more experience between each other, as well as using it to chat and keep track of party members in wilderness.
[img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/7083/adv1.png[/img]
Tools menu, containing many features. [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/8311/adv2.png[/img]
[b]Stat Changer:[/b] You kill monsters and gain 'Total Exp' you can distribute this onto any combat stats of your choice, and switch around whenever you like (outside of the wilderness only) [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/9623/adv3.png[/img]
Country Flags (over 300 to choose from) you can set your flag to let everyone know the country your from. Player info (more on that next) [img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/4968/adv4.png[/img] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/6770/watp.png[/img]
Player Information - You can right click > Info a player and check out details about their character. People can hide their combat stats if they wish to. [img]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/3892/adv5.png[/img]
Duel Arena - The only place in the game where you can duel, is just above edgeville in this new red carpet Dueling arena, Nurse Sarah will be there to heal you too. [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/7877/adv6.png[/img]
Teleporters - We have a few special NPCs that teleport you around towns, and Magic Portals that will take you to popular places in the wilderness.
This is a picture of the Dragon Maze (best place to gain rune items killing these monsters) [img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/800/adv7.png[/img]
[b]New Characters[/b] - this is your starter banks [img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/2665/adv8.png[/img]
Edgeville shop [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/2761/adv9.png[/img]
[b]Players[/b] - We have a very active community on our forums, this picture was taken ingame a few days after our launch [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/9159/adv10.png[/img]
[b]Come play! Many pkers are awaiting, if you ever played st0rk pk you will pick up this server very fast[/b]
We have many things planned for the future, such as an official clan system, RSC-TV (spectator view of other players) and lots more!
[b]Forums are in my signature, Register then download client on forums (no registration required, just login the client with a name thats not taken)
| | | \ /

item.title: BeyondRSC - For PKers By PKers
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:15, topic:326800”][quote author=malikz link=topic=421722.msg3168388#msg3168388 date=1270224832]
Luke why do you troll on here but act like an angel on your forums? Seems like a Matt2face to me.
[/quote]
You should look up the definition of the term troll before using it, I don’t troll what-so-ever. When I’m on RSCEmulation I speak on behalf of RSCEmulation so tend to treat it the same as I would if I was speaking on behalf of a business or company. I know that’s difficult concept to grasp for most people on here, however.[/quote]

malikz:

So you purposely find reasons to argue and go on peoples advertising thread to state your own opinion on matters not concerning in game? gtfo.

He does argue alot on other peoples & his thread, he is also right alot of the time.
(alot of the time does not mean all, don’t start flaming me & telling me his faults)

Read full topic

item.title: BeyondRSC - For PKers By PKers
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:172, topic:325410”]If it’s me you’re talking to so I took everything from my own view, and it is partly true. No matter what you say
Who has sentenced Xent for what he can, that is exactly opposite to what I said. wished that people would read before they post[/quote]

I read your post right through, I stand by what I said from what I’ve seen from you.

[quote=“Officer-Ahole, post:174, topic:325410”][quote author=Kryptix link=topic=421722.msg3155485#msg3155485 date=1269002019]
Always makes laugh how people can judge others on their ability, how do you know xEnt is better than say Peeter or Zilent? I’m not saying he isn’t but I wouldn’t know where to start in judging who’s actually ‘better’ because no doubt xEnt knows shit X doesn’t and vice-versa. I just think it’s a difficult statement to actually make.
[/quote]

This is the 3rd post I’ve read of yours this morning, and it’s all bitching. He never said xEnt was “better than “peeter” or ‘Zilent’”. He stated that xEnt is more advanced than most on this board, I see no cause in bitching over that. xEnt has his weaknesses, just like peeter, or zilent. Some random kid from this board that has little knowledge in java could be better than all 3 of them at a specific thing. Why are you bitching in the first place? Both of them are on your team.

You make no sense sometimes (a lot of the times, I was trying to be nice).[/quote]

I’ve miss understood what you were about Officer-Ahole, as Officer just said I was simply stating that Xent is one of
The most advanced coders their are more than just him on here.

Read full topic

item.title: BeyondRSC - For PKers By PKers

item.description:
@Officer-Ahole wrote:

Always makes laugh how people can judge others on their ability, how do you know xEnt is better than say Peeter or Zilent? I’m not saying he isn’t but I wouldn’t know where to start in judging who’s actually ‘better’ because no doubt xEnt knows shit X doesn’t and vice-versa. I just think it’s a difficult statement to actually make.

This is the 3rd post I’ve read of yours this morning, and it’s all bitching. He never said xEnt was “better than “peeter” or ‘Zilent’”. He stated that xEnt is more advanced than most on this board, I see no cause in bitching over that. xEnt has his weaknesses, just like peeter, or zilent. Some random kid from this board that has little knowledge in java could be better than all 3 of them at a specific thing. Why are you bitching in the first place? Both of them are on your team.

You make no sense sometimes (a lot of the times, I was trying to be nice).

item.title: BeyondRSC - For PKers By PKers
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:161, topic:325410”][quote author=i r will link=topic=421722.msg3146444#msg3146444 date=1268098287]
xEnt did a damn good job on this server. As Mental Piracy said it was the shit community that let it fail. Just because people didn’t get their way is what caused so many people to quit. In my opinion, the constant bitching and complaining about a server would make me want to take a break from the server, as xEnt did. So in no way is the so-called “fail” xEnt’s fault.
[/quote]
I don’t care about my grammar nor do i care about xent kryptix or anyone else that I don’t know personal…
noone said that xent coding fails nor that the server source failed. everything thogether failed the reasons doesn’t matter, the comunity is always the same theres flame there is fucking idiots there are ddosers/hackers xent couldn’t handle it I know xent is a peice of shit and does hardly show anyone respect but let me tell you about hes biggest goal everyones goal “MONEY”, xent always wants money… ask him your self wll you host beyond and make subs like reg members… ALWAYS MONEY INVOLVED… but who can blame him who doesn’t want more cash in hes pocket.[/quote]

Xent shows alot of respect and has always been a very helpful person, He is one of the most
advanced coders on the rsc board at the moment.

Also I believe I just posted in your release topic of a server you helped code parts for and didn’t get paid for your services or am I wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: BeyondRSC - For PKers By PKers
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

The end of BeyondRSC

Hi guys, i have decided not to bring up BeyondRSC, and not develop the second version of it. Instead i have decided to work with Zilent and Kryptix over at RSCEmulation

I may release the source code in the future, thanks to all that played it and had fun. For those that still enjoy a little bit of custom RSC, over at RSCEmulation i will be creating custom minigames and that fun stuff, also PKing over there is just as good (if not better) than it was here, rates are similar.

See you around.

Posted by: xEnt

Sad to hear… good luck anyways.

Read full topic
